bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign of an uncomfortable feeling of having eaten beyond repletion. Pu ji fang 普濟方 172: 青 空湯，治傷酒食飽滿 , “Blue sky decoction cures harm caused by [consumption of] wine and food to satiation and fullness ”.

②Refers to the condition of satiation experienced by a person after having dined. Ben cao jing ji zhu 本草經集注 preface: 病在骨髓者，宜飽滿而在夜 , “When the disease is in the bone marrow, it is advisable [to take medication] after one has eaten to satiation and fullness at night”.
